resources.string: Welcome to PocoTask app. You can start by registering or logging in.
What would you like to do next?
You are now successfully logged in!

Thank you for registering with PocoTask app. The app will guide you through the registration steps. All fields are required to fill in. First you have to enter your e-mail address and choose a password (has to be at least 6 characters long), after that you have to fill in your location, after which we will register you and you can log in the next time you use this app.
Congratulations! You have now registered with Poco Task app. Happy using!
